content.raw:
looks good, I noticed a few minor things that I'll mention here but I assume it's just not yet implemented

- admin checkbox does not display as checked for a user who is an admin

- number of pages remain the same after filtering with a search string

- Edit User -> Submit button doesn't close the modal dialog
content.html:
looks good, I noticed a few minor things that I'll mention here but I assume it's just not yet implemented

  • admin checkbox does not display as checked for a user who is an admin

  • number of pages remain the same after filtering with a search string

  • Edit User -> Submit button doesn't close the modal dialog
